messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] NTHK Origami
messages.msgSnippet: The real ones have real oshigata. The fakes have green colored photographs. It s that simple folks. Gordon ... From: henrymwilson
messages.messageBody:
The real ones have real oshigata. The fakes have green colored photographs.
It's that simple folks.



Gordon



-----Original Message-----
From: henrymwilson [mailto:henrymwilson@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 22, 2003 10:36 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] NTHK Origami



Hello.

I am thinking about buying a tanto. It has papers from the NTHK.
How can I tell if the papers are real or nasty fakes?

Thanks a lot

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] NTHK Origami
messages.msgSnippet: Henry, Please post some clear images of the NTHK papers to the group photo album and we should be able to sort out what you have.
messages.messageBody:
Henry,
Please post some clear images of the NTHK papers to the group photo album and we should be able to sort out what you have.

http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst

Regards,
Jim
